name: sentinel-webhook-relay
description: Generic webhook relay integration for Sentinel events

scripts.validate: node -e "const m = require('./manifest.json'); const { validateManifest } = require('@sentinel-unturned/integration-sdk'); const r = validateManifest(m); if (!r.success) { console.error(JSON.stringify(r.errors, null, 2)); process.exit(1); } console.log('Manifest valid');"
